title: ZUZUAN 2 Piece Hammer Set,includes 1 Pack 8 OZ Mini Stubby Claw Hammer and 1 Pack 16 OZ Fiberglass General Purpose Claw Hammer,Soft Nonslip Handle & Heat Treated Head,Heavier for Higher Hardness
descriptions:
Introducing the ZUZUAN 2 Piece Hammer Set, the ultimate tool combo for all your hammering and clawing needs! This set includes a 8 OZ Mini Stubby Claw Hammer and a 16 OZ Fiberglass General Purpose Claw Hammer, both crafted with high carbon steel heads that are heat treated for maximum durability and strength. The rubber handle with TPR coating ensures a comfortable and non-slip grip, while the fiberglass construction absorbs vibrations for a smoother user experience. 

With features like glue feed technology and well-balanced weight distribution, these hammers are designed for maximum performance in driving and pulling nails. The ergonomic design and convenient hang hole make handling and storage a breeze. Don't settle for less when it comes to your tools - choose the ZUZUAN 2 Piece Hammer Set for superior quality and reliability.
